# _effects_of_RYGB_gut_hormones

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

This repository consists of scripts related to statistical analysis of the research project investigating the "Effects of acute exercise training session on glucose metabolism, gut hormones, and inflammatory markers before and after Roux-en-Y Gastric Bypass"
